data.title: Charter Bus Rentals Spokane Washington
data.meta_description: Price 4 Limo Spokane is a charter bus rental, minibus & motor coach bus service in Spokane, WA. With over 2,200 5-stars reviews, we're a top rated charter bus company. Call Price4limo.com at 866-265-5479
data.text:
How Much Does a Charter Bus Cost in Spokane?

Since Price4Limo offers personalized quotes based on your unique trip details, bus rental costs vary trip to trip. Factors like passenger count, travel dates, bus type, and custom amenity requests all play a role in determining your final Spokane bus rental rate. Generally speaking, renting during peak seasons like spring and summer will be pricier due to high demand. For the most accurate quote tailored to your trip's needs, our team is happy to provide a free, no-obligation quote once you call (866) 265-5479 with your trip details handy. The earlier you book, the more likely you are to secure the best deal!

Rent a Charter Bus for Stress-Free Corporate Events in Spokane

Planning an offsite luncheon, conference, or company party? As a burgeoning tech hub, Spokane offers venues like the Spokane Convention Center, Davenport Grand Hotel, and Service Alternatives corporate headquarters for business functions of any size. Streamline event transportation and keep your schedule on track with a bus rental from Price4Limo. Rather than coordinating rideshares or relying on public transportation, your team can ride together on a charter bus equipped for productivity. Request features like leather seats, individual lighting, power outlets, complimentary WiFi, and more. We can even organize routes from office branches to your event space and provide return shuttles at the end of the night.

Bus Rentals for Spokane School Trips

In a historic riverside town like Spokane, field trips are always a great idea! So whether you're heading to the Mobius Science Center with a group of aspiring astronauts or visiting the Northwest Museum of Arts & Culture with your elementary art class, Price4Limo can get your crew there easily. Give your pupils a comfortable, exciting learning experience traveling in a charter bus outfitted with cushioned seats, climate control, entertainment systems, and WiFi. Reserve your Spokane school trip bus rental by calling (866) 265-5479 today!

Mobius Science Center - 333 W Spokane Falls Blvd Suite 204, Spokane, WA 99201 - (509) 321-7121

Northwest Museum of Arts & Culture - 2316 W 1st Ave, Spokane, WA 99201 - (509) 456-3931

Spokane Falls Community College - 3410 W Fort George Wright Dr, Spokane, WA 99224 - (509) 533-7000

Wedding Shuttles & Transportation in Spokane

From ceremonies at the historic Cathedral of St. John the Evangelist to receptions at venues like the Montvale Event Center, you can have your dream Spokane wedding paired with effortless transportation. Rather than worrying about convoluted parking or keeping a detailed schedule, your guests can relax aboard a comfortable charter bus or passenger van navigates to each wedding activity. Set a designated pickup time and location, and we'll get everyone to the rehearsal ceremony, photos, reception, and afterparty.

The Madison House Event Venue - 906 W Main Ave Suite 130, Spokane, WA 99201 - (509) 534-0444

The Montvale Event Center - 4211 S Regal St, Spokane, WA 99223 - (509) 747-7445

Numerica Performing Arts Center - 123 N Wenatchee Ave, Wenatchee, WA 98801 - (509) 663-2787

Easy Airport Transfers at Spokane International Airport

Forget the stress of parking and navigating Spokane International Airport (GEG) when you reserve an airport shuttle bus with Price4Limo. Your vehicle will greet your group upon arrival and transport you directly to your hotel, or we can provide departing airport transfer service at the end of your trip. With room for luggage and stop-request flexibility, our airport shuttles simplify travel in and out of Spokane. Call (866) 265-5479 to book!

9000 W Airport Dr, Spokane, WA 99224 - (509) 455-6455

Sporting Event Transportation in Spokane

Spokane is full of sports action, from Hoopfest (the world's largest 3-on-3 basketball tournament) to the Spokane Chiefs WHL hockey team that plays downtown at the Spokane Arena. And no trip to this city is complete without catching a Gonzaga Bulldogs basketball game! As a premier transportation provider for sports teams, Price4Limo can shuttle fans and players to and from sporting events across Spokane. Store equipment in the luggage hold and relax in plush seats rather than cramming into cramped cars. Your private charter bus will get you to the arena rested, pumped up, and ready to cheer on your squad!

Spokane Arena - 720 W Mallon Ave, Spokane, WA 99201 - (509) 279-7000

Martin Stadium - 750 NE Stadium Way, Pullman, WA 99164 - (509) 335-3509

Long-Term Transportation Solutions in Spokane

Need a set of dependable wheels in Spokane for the long haul? We can set up daily, weekly, or monthly bus shuttle services tailored to your organization's transportation needs. We've helped convention centers, hotels, schools, and more simplify travel logistics with customized shuttle programs. Explain your ideal schedule and routes, and we will find the perfect long-term bus rental to match. Whether you need a daily employee shuttle from downtown to your business campus or an ongoing academic shuttle between school buildings, Price4Limo has a fleet ready to keep you moving.

Book Your Spokane Charter Bus Rental

For fast, easy group transportation in Spokane and throughout Washington, look no further than Price4Limo. Our team is available 24/7 at (866) 265-5479 to answer your questions and provide a personalized quote for your next charter bus rental. Let us simplify your next group trip!

Experience Spokane's Entertainment Scene by Charter Bus

As the largest city in eastern Washington, Spokane is full of exciting entertainment for visiting groups. Catch a show at the art deco Fox Theater, enjoy seasonal theater productions at the Spokane Civic Theatre, or laugh out loud at the Spokane Comedy Club. Music lovers can rock out at the Knitting Factory Concert House or the historic Bing Crosby Theater. For a fun night out, your group can bar hop in the lively downtown district, which offers hip lounges and old-school watering holes. Try tasty local brews at craft beer havens like Whistle Punk Brewing or Iron Goat Brewing. If you're a wine lover, Spokane has urban wineries like Barrister Winery and town trolley tours of local vineyards. With so much to experience after dark in Spokane, renting a charter bus is the perfect way to keep your evening plans on track. And you won't have to cut the fun short or designate drivers when you have a charter bus rental to bring everyone home together at the end of the night!

Tour Spokane's Local Breweries and Wineries by Charter Bus

The Lilac City has a fast-growing craft beer scene that visitors love exploring. Take an afternoon brewery tour with stops at places like Whistle Punk Brewing, Iron Goat Brewing, and the award-winning No-Li Brewhouse. Or spend a day touring Spokane's wineries, like Arbor Crest Wine Cellars, which is set on a scenic cliff overlooking the Spokane River. Wine and beer tastings are always more fun with a group! Rent a charter bus for brew tours or winery excursions and leave the complicated logistics to your bus. They'll handle parking and navigation between destinations while your passengers enjoy tasting flights, food pairings, and more. Plus, you'll have room for any cases of beer or wine you purchase along the way!

Plan Adventure-Filled Days at Spokane's Top Attractions

Spokane is an ideal home base for outdoor recreation and family fun. Start your day hiking among enormous ponderosa pines and rare flora at Riverside State Park. Then cool off at Riverfront Park's ice ribbon skating trail that winds through 20 acres of sculpted flower beds and manicured lawns. Let the kids burn off energy climbing the Spokane Children's Playground's three-story tower with twisting slides. With room for luggage and gear, our charter bus rentals allow you to come prepared for a day of exploration.

Top Neighborhoods to Explore in Spokane

Start your trip off at some of these amazing places!

Browne's Addition

This historic neighborhood features Queen Anne and Tudor style mansions built between 1880 and 1920 by Spokane's founding families. Today, the area is filled with boutique shops, cafes, and brewpubs. Walk along tree-lined streets, grab lunch on a patio, or ride the Browne's Addition Trolley around the district.

Kendall Yards

Right across the Spokane River lies this newly developed urban village. Kendall Yards has farm-to-table dining at spots like The Yard and craft brews at Yard House. On sunny days, cool off with ice cream from Brain Freeze Creamery or unwind at the al fresco Common House bar.

Garland District

Just north of downtown, Garland offers funky art galleries, dive bars, and an eclectic mix of restaurants. Grab Mediterranean fare at Baba, house-made sausages at Prohibition Gastropub, or late-night munchies at the 24/7 satellite Jim's Drive-In. Catch some tunes at The Bartlett or a show at the quirky Blue Door Theatre.

Perry District

One of Spokane's most walkable areas, this north-central neighborhood is filled with shopping and dining along its main artery, Perry Street. Sip lattes at Rocket Bakery, enjoy family-friendly eats at The Elk, or have locally-sourced comfort food at Mama Mia's Trattoria.

South Perry

Called SoPo by locals, this hip district south of the city center has relaxed cafes, unique boutiques, and a lively nightlife scene. Sip craft cocktails at The Deep, get your sweat on at Empire Cycle Studio, or belt out tunes at karaoke joints like Bob's Musical Karaoke.
